snippet: The Interior Department should broker a compromise with a Denver-based gas company, so as not to drill in Desolation Canyon, a wild and fragile landscape.
abstract: Editorial criticizes the Interior Dept for tentatively approving an overly aggressive natural gas drilling project, proposed by Denver-based gas company Gasco, in northeastern Utah; urges the department to broker a compromise with the company that would allow the project to go forward without causing unnecessary environmental damage.
lead_paragraph: The Interior Department should broker a compromise with a Denver-based gas company, so as not to drill in Desolation Canyon, a wild and fragile landscape.

headline.seo: A Win-Win Deal on Natural Gas
headline.main: A Win-Win Deal on Natural Gas
headline.print_headline: A Win-Win Deal on Natural Gas
